lines.text: AGGH! God, you're alive! I thought that rabbit was eating your head.
You know perfectly well, new sex is like crack.
You're going to have to take that rag off your face if you expect her to read your lips.
We should go to the park this weekend and watch all the children shooting squirrels with their BB guns.
True. We don't appreciate nature, enough.
The simple plan is, no one in this room is going to have sex with anyone else in this room. We'll be platonic... like our parents.
I don't need to get laid. I stored it up before me and Hector broke up.
Stored up? What are you, a chipmunk?
You don't just make out with someone in a meat locker who you're indifferent to.
